#summary Driver initialization

<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

= Introduction =

This page will explain, how to initialize the driver. This means :
  # Initialize the connection with the server,
  # Initialize the pool of connection,
  # Initialize the safe mode,
  # Initialize the logging mode.


= Details =

Initialization of the driver is done by this block of code :
{{{
<driver:JMCNetMongoDBDriver id="mongoDriver"
				hostname="{Constantes.mongoDbHostname}"
				port="{Constantes.mongoDbHostPort}"
				databaseName="{Constantes.mongoDbDatabaseName}"
				socketPoolMin="10"
				socketPoolMax="20"
				socketTimeOutMs="10000"
				username="jmc"
				password="jmc"
				logBSON="false"
				logDocument="false"/>
}}}
